stem: Given question: What could you do inside but not outside if you have boredom? and answer: hang out at bar, explain why in
no_more_50_words: Most  bars that serve alcohol are inside of buildings, and so, usually, hanging out at a bar is an activity that could only be done inside. Exceptions to the "bars are inside" rule include: rooftop bars, and oceanside bars on beaches.
more_than_250:
When boredom strikes, what better place to go to than a bar? Going to a bar is one of the most fun and exciting things you can do when you’re feeling bored and want to do something different. While there are a lot of activities you can do outdoors, such as going to the beach or the park, these can be quite limiting as you’re often limited by the weather or time of day. Going to a bar gives you the freedom to stay indoors and still have a great time.

At a bar, you can enjoy a variety of different activities. Whether you’re looking for a casual evening with friends, a night of dancing, or a night of barside gaming, you’re sure to find something to keep you entertained. You can order a few drinks, play some pool, and just hang out with friends. Bars usually have plenty of TVs and music, so you can watch sports or listen to some tunes while you relax. Plus, there’s usually plenty of bar food, so you can have a snack while you’re there as well.

Bars can also be great for socializing. You can meet new people, catch up with old friends, or just sit back and listen to conversations from all around you. If you’re feeling particularly social, you can even join in on one of the many conversations going on around you. Plus, it’s a great place to start networking if that’s something you’re interested in.

Going to a bar can also be a great way to take your mind off of things. If you’ve been feeling stressed out or overwhelmed with work or other commitments, going to a bar can be a great way to just relax and unwind. You can order a drink, listen to some music, and just take it easy for a while.

In short, going to a bar is a great way to combat boredom. There’s plenty of activities to do and people to meet, and it can be a great way to take your mind off of things and just enjoy a casual evening.
